Class FileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • FileManager

  • public class FileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for writing, saving, and loading files of various types.

      • getChar

        public static char getChar(int n)
        Get the character at position n in the alphabet.
        Parameters:
        n - The index in the alphabet at which we want to find a character.
        Returns:

      • postscriptHeader

        public static void postscriptHeader(java.lang.String fileName,
                    java.lang.String box)
        Write a header for a postscript file to the given file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file on which to write.
        box - Coordinates of the bounding box for the image, in the form "xmin ymin xmax ymax"

      • postscriptDump

                  PatchDisplay patch)
        Write a patch to a postscript file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file on which to write.
        patch - The PatchDisplay to be depicted in the file.

                     RhombBoundary r)
        Save a RhombBoundary to the file with the given name.
        Parameters:

        r - The RhombBoundary that we wish to save.

        state - The SubstitutionEditor to be saved.

        Read an edge sequence list from a file in ./edges
        Parameters:

        Returns:
